Key Match Events: Luis Gil pitched a no-hitter through 3.1 innings
Cody Bellinger broke the no-hitter in the 4th inning with a double
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Rizzo received a warm welcome from the crowd of his former team in his first at-bat
Others: Luis Gil returned to the mound after being on the injured list
Jake Cousins, Tommy Kahnle and Luke Weaver each pitched a scoreless inning
Clarke Schmidt is expected to return from the IL and make his first start since May 26 in the next game
